title: WTB: T212 Million now with trade bait
author: lug-nut

posts.post_title: WTB: T212 Million now with trade bait
posts.post_content:
Helping a buddy finish a team set. Looking for graded 2 or above he has very little to trade but paying handsomely for either or both. Send an email with scans and asking price.

thx
Found the Raymer, still need the Million.

posts.post_title: Trade bait now included - Still need a Million
posts.post_content:
Buddy is now considering many cards of Nolan Ryan, Pete Rose, Johnny Bench, Clementes, a Mantle or two, and a few other stars. All graded PSA or SGC. All Roses are PSA graded. 

Any graded Million will finish his team set. email or PM if you have one to sell or have a lead on one as I'm sure there is a finder's bonus for the help.

posts.post_title: Still trying to finish this team
